com.risk.model

Class ReinforcementPhaseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.ReinforcementPhaseModel

  • public class ReinforcementPhaseModel
extends java.util.Observable
    The Class ReinforcementPhaseModel is an Observable class which has methods for processing reiforcements and also this class is being observed by an Observer ReinforcementsUI and CardExchangeUI to display the internal dyanmic details during the reinforcement phase.
    Author:
    Ashish Sharma
    See Also:
    ReinforcementsUI

    • Field Detail

      • reinforcement

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> reinforcement
        The HashMap reinforcement stores the reinforcements recieved for a player in a single turn. It updates at every single turn for a player.

        The key here is a String storing the player and value is the reinforcements recieved in a single turn.

      • playerCards

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> playerCards
        The HashMap playerCards stores the previous history of card exchange(if any) for a particular player and each key points to an ArrayList of the cards available.

      • prevPlayerCards

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> prevPlayerCards
        The HashMap prevPlayerCards stores the cards before exchange. It is used by Observer CardExchangeUI to display the cards before exchange.

      • prevCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> prevCards
        The ArrayList prevCards stores the cards before exchange.

      • chosenCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> chosenCards
        The ArrayList chosenCards stores the cards chosen for exchange.

      • newCards

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newCards
        The ArrayList newCards stores the updated cards after exchange.

      • prevPlayerInfo

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> prevPlayerInfo
        The static HashMap prevPlayerInfo stores the playerInfo before the reinforcement.

      • calcReinforcementsByTerr

        public java.lang.String calcReinforcementsByTerr(java.lang.String player)
        This method calculates reinforcements by territories owned by a player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player Number passed as a String
        Returns:
        String The return String contains of the player, the number of territories owned by player and the reinforcements calculated all separated by a comma ','

      • calcReinforcementByCntrlVal

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> calcReinforcementByCntrlVal(java.lang.String player,
                                                                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> continentControlValueHashMap)
        This method calculates reinforcements by control value of the continents. It adds up to the reinforcements armies for a player a number equal to the control value of the continents the player owns
        Parameters:
        player - Player Number passed as a String
        continentControlValueHashMap - The HashMap continentControlValueHashMap stores the control value of the continents
        Returns:
        Return an ArrayList cntrlValMsg containing for a player appropriate messages for each continent.

      • calcReinforcementByCards

        public void calcReinforcementByCards(java.lang.String player,
                                     java.lang.String currentPlyrStrategy)
        This method calculates reinforcements by exchange of cards a player has.
        Parameters:
        player - Player Number passed as a String
        currentPlyrStrategy - the current plyr strategy
